text:
Nodeul Station is a train station of Seoul Subway Line 9, located in Dongjak District, Seoul, South Korea.
Origin of staton name.
Originally, the name "Nodeul" means "The stepping stone that Egret playing with", and now it means the area near Noryangjin(Which is a hanja translation from Nodeul).
Station structure.
Station has 2 side platforms, 2 tracks.
